cscie160.hw5

Class ATMImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie160.hw5.ATMImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ATM

    public class ATMImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ATM
    ATMImplementation class runs on the server side. It implements interface ATM. This class will update/return the account balance as requested by the client.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Kalpan
